copy.noSelection: Please make a selection before clicking on Submit.
copy.speedChatPlus: In order to confirm your chat preference, a verification has been sent to the e-mail address on record. Please follow the steps in the e-mail to complete your registration.
copy.generalError: There was an error processing your request. Please try again later.
copy.speedchatalerttext:
• Open to all Fairies
  • SpeedChat uses a set list of words and phrases that Fairies select from a drop-down Menu.
copy.speedchatplusalerttext:
• Open to all Fairies, but can be turned off using Disney's Parental Controls.
  • SpeedChat Plus is a keyboard chat system that uses a dictionary of Fairy-friendly words.
  • This chat is filtered and moderated. If a Fairy types a word that is not in the dictionary, that word will not be seen by other Fairies.
copy.notLoggedIn: You must log in to change your preferences!
